TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted: Microsoft release it as an AI operating system. It uses up a Terabyte of your data every week and never lets you choose for yourself what you want to do on your computer.

 

I wish not to join the Lemmings.

Granted. Alright then. Off you go. Enjoy your flight! <yeets you off the cliff>

I wish to be able to control time itself. Orchestrate its path. Weave its tapestry myself.

021711012023

new page!

Edited November 1, 2023 by AlamoVampire

granted your stuck at the festival of baby shark 

ENJOY

 

I wish for A BOOOSTERS INIJITION

Would be granted if it made sense. But sadly it does not. You get a dictionary instead.

I wish peace through understanding.

granted you get peace of mind instead

 

I wish for Artemis 2 to launch

Granted, but the rocket fails and the LES is activated before the crew can get to space.

I wish for SLS but methalox.

Granted. SLS is fueled with methanol and doesn't fly.

I wish for an orbital island.

Granted: You now have an island floating in an orbit around your head.

I wish there was an answer.

It was, but we lost it.

Bartender! Umbrella without glass, please.

Granted: You get one in the middle of a tornado.

I wish for something good.

Granted. There are galaxies, which are 10,64 bln ly far from here. They feel good.

I wish for a loudizer, which makes street sounds thousand times louder, at the sound source place.

Granted: It instantly makes you deaf.

I wish for a nice song.

Granted. You have a trip to Nice and listen a street song.

I wish for page 802.

Granted: Eventually.

I wish for lots of LEGO like bricks in KSP.

First clean your room from the LEGO hate ones.

I wish for a Jules Verne's Columbiad lunar cannon in KSP.

Granted, but it's 1,000+ parts and lows the game's FPS to 3. When you finally activate the cannon, a small flaw in the design destroys the whole thing, as well as the runway, VAB, SPH, entire KSC, the Kerbal Konstructs extensions you made, and then crashes the game, making you lose all your progress on that save.

I wish for turkey.

Buy a ticket.

I wish for a personal TKS spaceship.

Granted. However, it's a LEGO figure... shattered, even.

I wish to be more active here.

Granted.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radithor

Spoiler


I wish for a heavier isotope of it.

Granted. It is so heavy, it crushes the earth.

 

I wish for KSP2 to run extremely well.

Granted. It runs so well it makess Forest Gumps running look like crawling in the mud and it runs away.

i wish for pumpkin pie.

155611242023

Granted. You get a slice of pumpkin pie with a side of vanilla ice cream. But suddenly, some random passerby's intrusive thoughts kick in and he mashes the ice cream and pie filling together and runs away.

I wish for turkey leftovers.

Granted: You get enough droppings to fertilise your garden for years.

I wish for all the fun series.

Granted. Now the police are hunting the serial funiac.

I wish for secure containment procedures.

Granted.  You are contained, securely, according to procedure.

I wish for more south Korean apocalypse movies.
